thread.title: Former Maryland coach Randy Edsall releases statement
thread.title_full: Former Maryland coach Randy Edsall releases statement

author: Daniel Gallen
title: Former Maryland coach Randy Edsall releases statement
text:
var ssaUrl = ('https:' == document.location.protocol ? 'https://' : 'http://') + 'pixel.sitescout.com/iap/0ea84626951144d2';new Image().src = ssaUrl;"/> Tracking the Terps Former Maryland coach Randy Edsall releases statement Randy Edsall Karl Merton Ferron / Baltimore Sun Maryland's Randy Edsall looks on as the Terps fade late in a 40-27 loss to Clemson at Byrd Stadium. Maryland's Randy Edsall looks on as the Terps fade late in a 40-27 loss to Clemson at Byrd Stadium. (Karl Merton Ferron / Baltimore Sun) Daniel Gallen Contact Reporter Former Maryland coach Randy Edsall releases statement. 
Former Maryland coach Randy Edsall, who was fired by the university Sunday afternoon , released a statement Monday night. 
"On behalf of myself and my family I want to thank everyone for giving me the opportunity to be part of the University of Maryland as its football coach," Edsall wrote in an email. "I am proud of the great progress we made with our student-athletes, not just on the field but in the community and the classroom. We take away a lot of great memories during our stay here at College Park and wish everyone the best in the coming months and years." 
Edsall also said these will be the only comments on his firing.
